item.title: The Gospel Makes People Happy
item.description:
The Gospel Makes People Happy by Elder Teddy E. Brewerton, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 148th Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 1978
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Teddy E. Brewerton, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy

item.title: Obedience—Full Obedience
item.description:
Obedience—Full Obedience by Elder Teddy E. Brewerton, Of the First Quorum of the Seventy given in Sunday Afternoon of 151st Annual General Conference on Tue Mar 31 1981
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
